configuration.title: DeepSeek AI Settings
configuration.deepseek.apiUrl.descriptio: The API endpoint for DeepSeek (default: https://api.deepseek.com/v1).
configuration.deepseek.model.description: The AI model to use for generation.
configuration.deepseek.temperature.descr: The temperature parameter for the API. Higher values mean more randomness.
